summary: The third and final vampire clan leader from Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#CC0018][size=4][center][img]https://i.imgur.com/2LW8KS9.png[/img][/center][/size][/color][/b]Does his name seem familiar? If you've played Morrowind, chances are you've met him before. Raxle Berne is standalone, meaning that he doesn't require any other mods. He starts at level 5 and will level with you indefinitely. Raxle has............................... been wandering Tamriel since the Second Era, and has had a lot of time honing her skills. Therefore she is very strong, and adept with both magic and melee combat. 

Volrina wears vampire armor and comes equipped with her trusted glass sword that has served her for centuries. In her possession she has two powerful artifacts; the Quarra heirloom amulet and the coveted bottle of ancient Quarra blood. If you drink it, the blood of the Quarra masters will mix with yours and instantly turn you into a vampire. I highly recommend using a follower overhaul mod like [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url], but it's not required.

Let me know if you find any bugs and I'll do my best to fix them. Please share your screenshots! [color=#000000]❤[/color]

[color=#000000]SPECIAL EDITION?[/color][color=#ffd966] [/color]Soon!

[color=#000000][size=4][b]DETAILS[/b][/size][/color]
[b]Name[/b]: Raxle Berne
[b]Race[/b]: imperial
[b]Location[/b]: Hall of the Dead catacombs, Whiterun
[b]Body type: [/b]vanilla
[b]Weight:[/b] 61
[b]Voice:[/b] sultry
[b]Essential[/b]: yes
[b]Marriable[/b]: yes

[b][size=4][color=#000000]INSTALLATION[/color]
[/size][/b]Install using a mod manager of your choice or manually extract the contents to your Data folder. 

[color=#000000][size=4][b]FAQ[/b][/size][/color]
[b]Q: Can you make a version with a different body type/skin texture/hairstyle/hair color/etc?[/b]
A: No. It's impossible to cater to everyone's taste, so I am simply going with my own. If you want a different body type, hairstyle, etc, you can easily change it yourself to your liking, but don't re-upload anywhere.

[b]Q: What is he wearing in the pictures?[/b]
A: Mods used in screenshots: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74239/?]Black Viper's Will[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83736/?]Ultimate Assortment[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073/?]Apachii Divine Elegance Store[/url]. Poses by [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/halos-poser-s1-6/]Halo[/url].

[b]Q: Why isn't the outfit from the screenshots included?[/b]
A: [url=https://pand0rable.tumblr.com/post/165866969698/why-dont-i-include-outfits-from-my-screenshots-in]Why I will never include outfits[/url]. 

[b]Q: Can I include your follower in a mod?[/b]
A: No. I have already released my follower, it doesn't need to be included in another mod. If you think the follower goes well with your mod, feel free to link to this page in the description. Read the permissions for more.

[b]Q: Why doesn't he look the same in my game as in the screenshots?[/b]
A: Likely due to different setups. In the screenshots I used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon Prime ENB[/url].

[b][color=#000000][size=4]CREDITS[/size][/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by hhaley
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS hairdos renewal[/url] by kalilies, stealthic khaos & shocky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by hvergelmir
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes[/url] by nerune
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] by expired

Big thanks to these amazing mod authors for their great work, and for letting me use their assets.[size=4][b]

[color=#000000][size=4]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color][/b]
Don't claim my content as your own. Don't re-upload my content anywhere - if I want them on another site, I will upload them there myself. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!
author: Pandorable
